title: Bazzu
author: Bazzu
content: I want to ask everyone, now the number of altcoins is increasing and the prices are various, do you know, in your opinion, what altcoins are still cheap now but have good potential for the future? I want to hear an explanation from you?

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: All altcoins have experienced a deep decline when the market entered a bearish period and I'm sure none of the altcoins have experienced an increase and reached their previous ATH so we can say that everything is still cheap if you want to have it, do it immediately and always remember the risk that there will be an altcoin that will not return to its highest price and no one knows what it's the name so when you choose the wrong altcoin then you will have the opportunity to also lose not just profit, so be careful.

comments.author: yazher
comments.body: Quote from: Bazzu on January 31, 2023, 01:52:47 AMI want to ask everyone, now the number of altcoins is increasing and the prices are various, do you know, in your opinion, what altcoins are still cheap now but have good potential for the future? I want to hear an explanation from you?Like you, there are lots of people who wanted to find the right coins to invest their money in in this current situation because once the price of BTC will gonna rises up, surely the right coins will also spike their price and that will gonna be the best moment if you gonna invest in the right coins. Surely the competition in the market is currently becoming so hard to predict and choose which coin to invest and as you said, you are looking for coins that are still cheap with potential, I recommend doing your own research with such coins and surely we will gonna find one rather than blindly following someone telling you this and that is the right coin.

comments.author: DOH!
comments.body: Quote from: Bazzu on January 31, 2023, 01:52:47 AMwhat altcoins are still cheap now but have good potential for the future? I want to hear an explanation from you?I think the defi space is still a big swimming pool with lots of promising potential for the future.  I have faith in one of those defi coins which is SOV and I believe in the sustainability of the project in the long term, hopefully the free market will decide to accept it more when future bitcoin becomes scarce.  Rarely, nobody sells them when bitcoin can be used as collateral for a loan and is fully decentralized.  The current price is too cheap for what it has high reception.

comments.author: hd49728
comments.body: Quote from: Bazzu on January 31, 2023, 01:52:47 AMI want to ask everyone, now the number of altcoins is increasing and the prices are various, do you know, in your opinion, what altcoins are still cheap now but have good potential for the future?It is too early to talk about altcoins when bear market has yet completed its time.Before a completion of bear market, bottoms will not be seen for altcoins and you should wait for a few more months before buying altcoins. You can buy them now if you afford to lose in next months before a bull run for Bitcoin starts and altcoins will officially recover from their bottoms.Not all altcoins can make new all time highs in a next bull run in 2024, 2025 and I only bet my capital into Ethereum, BNB for altcoin part. Bitcoin is my most favorite part of my portolio.

comments.author: passwordnow
comments.body: Quote from: Bazzu on January 31, 2023, 01:52:47 AMI want to ask everyone, now the number of altcoins is increasing and the prices are various, do you know, in your opinion, what altcoins are still cheap now but have good potential for the future? I want to hear an explanation from you?As much as I want to say something that is on my mind, I guess I'll have to stick with those that are at the top. They may have already reached a point where everyone freaked out due to it getting to its peak. There's a likelihood that it may happen again but that's for these top altcoins in the market.If there are those low-price altcoins with high supplies, it doesn't matter. What matters to them is the market that they're in and how will the demand will go.

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: Quote from: Bazzu on January 31, 2023, 01:52:47 AMI want to ask everyone, now the number of altcoins is increasing and the prices are various, do you know, in your opinion, what altcoins are still cheap now but have good potential for the future? I want to hear an explanation from you?You know you have a lot to choose from here in cryptocurrency. And our earnings here depend on our beliefs and choice of course.Now, if you ask me, although most altcoins are high risk if I compare them to bitcoin. I have a suggestion but it's best that you only invest in it in the amount you are ready to beat it, and one of the coins I'm referring to are SHIB, Bonk, Shibarium, bone, Matic, and GRT.

comments.author: Jackl87
comments.body: Quote from: Bazzu on January 31, 2023, 01:52:47 AMI want to ask everyone, now the number of altcoins is increasing and the prices are various, do you know, in your opinion, what altcoins are still cheap now but have good potential for the future? I want to hear an explanation from you?Obviously it is very hard to predict anything in the crypto market because most of the time, at least for me the price movements are coming pretty much out of nowhere and most of the times they don't really seem to have a reason or a logical explanation. I was buying some Cosmos (ATOM) a while ago for around 10$ per coin, because i think that this project definitely has a lot of potential to become really big in the future and i think that a x10 or even more from here on are definitely possible if the market overall is doing well.I also looked at NEAR, but i did not buy at 1,30$ per coin and now it is at 2,30$ so obviously i can get myself to buy some now. If it drops below 2$ again i will probably buy some NEAR.

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: Bazzu on January 31, 2023, 01:52:47 AMI want to ask everyone, now the number of altcoins is increasing and the prices are various, do you know, in your opinion, what altcoins are still cheap now but have good potential for the future? I want to hear an explanation from you?BNB still have good fundamentals/price ratio. Here is a thread I made about BNB back when it was @15$.Phenomenon of BNB (Fundamental analysis BNB/USD)Now, despite the fact its at 300$ and we are in 600 days+ bear market it still looks good. I'll update calculations (P/E indicators) when i'll find a time.If you want high risk/reward coin with tiny marketcap take a look at IDENA. First Proof-of-person blockchain. No KYC. Sybil resistance achieved via Turing test.

comments.author: Bazzu
comments.body: Quote from: Strongkored on January 31, 2023, 04:11:57 AMAll altcoins have experienced a deep decline when the market entered a bearish period and I'm sure none of the altcoins have experienced an increase and reached their previous ATH so we can say that everything is still cheap if you want to have it, do it immediately and always remember the risk that there will be an altcoin that will not return to its highest price and no one knows what it's the name so when you choose the wrong altcoin then you will have the opportunity to also lose not just profit, so be careful.your opinion is also right, indeed if you look at the current market it is still in a bear market, which of course all coin prices have fallen, so it's just us who have to be smart in choosing coins that will have good potential,,but do you have any suggestions for me, which are altcoins that you think have high potential for the future?

comments.author: TravelMug
comments.body: Quote from: Bazzu on January 31, 2023, 01:52:47 AMI want to ask everyone, now the number of altcoins is increasing and the prices are various, do you know, in your opinion, what altcoins are still cheap now but have good potential for the future? I want to hear an explanation from you?As you have said, there are literally thousands of them and some are being born like every day. So it's hard to track of every altcoin that is in the market right now. So for me I can't give any who has the potential to become huge in the future.And with that said, I will stick with the "traditional" altcoins like ETH, BNB or ADA.They are solid to begin with, they've reach new ATH last bull run and I think they will do the same in 2024/25 bull run again, so I will stick with them, in my opinion.

comments.author: LogitechMouse
comments.body: Quote from: Bazzu on January 31, 2023, 01:52:47 AMI want to ask everyone, now the number of altcoins is increasing and the prices are various, do you know, in your opinion, what altcoins are still cheap now but have good potential for the future? I want to hear an explanation from you?I can't pick any specific altcoins right now because we don't know the future.We don't know which coin will go up in price a few years from now. Does anybody expect for the price of BNB to shoot up that high after they created Binance Smart Chain? Do we expect FTX to be a fraud exchange until it happened? The point is, those altcoins that you're seeing right now might go up in price in the future, but at the same time, there is a chance that it will not.The good thing though is that, we have seen the worst already. We've seen markets going down. We've seen crypto coins going down really hard and currently, we are in the phase where accumulation is happening thus, the market is slowly going up. I will not say a specific altcoin to you, but I guess it's safe to say if you will just pick in the top 50 coins in terms of market cap. There is still a risk on it, but lower compare to those new projects out there.

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: Quote from: Bazzu on January 31, 2023, 01:52:47 AMI want to ask everyone, now the number of altcoins is increasing and the prices are various, do you know, in your opinion, what altcoins are still cheap now but have good potential for the future? I want to hear an explanation from you?Just be aware that not all cheap are potential to buy or guaranteed to pump in the future.Another thing is to make sure you always verify especially if you hear the altcoins from someone telling you to buy. There are a lot of altcoins out there right now and most of them are scams!And btw, how you can define cheap altcoins? Is that measured from their previous all-time high and how much percentage dropped since all-time high?

comments.author: Ayers
comments.body: Quote from: Bazzu on March 04, 2023, 03:55:46 AMQuote from: Strongkored on January 31, 2023, 04:11:57 AMAll altcoins have experienced a deep decline when the market entered a bearish period and I'm sure none of the altcoins have experienced an increase and reached their previous ATH so we can say that everything is still cheap if you want to have it, do it immediately and always remember the risk that there will be an altcoin that will not return to its highest price and no one knows what it's the name so when you choose the wrong altcoin then you will have the opportunity to also lose not just profit, so be careful.your opinion is also right, indeed if you look at the current market it is still in a bear market, which of course all coin prices have fallen, so it's just us who have to be smart in choosing coins that will have good potential,,but do you have any suggestions for me, which are altcoins that you think have high potential for the future?You better do your own research and make your own decision. Investing in Altcoins is aimed at finding high returns, but the risks are also high, so it is impossible to give advice to someone, nor should invest according to the advice of others. If you want high returns and are willing to take risks, then look for meme projects and new projects. Regarding altcoins, I will only focus on top coins like ETH, BNB, and ADA... maybe the profits won't be as high as shitcoin projects, but the risks are also somewhat limited.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Bazzu on January 31, 2023, 01:52:47 AMI want to ask everyone, now the number of altcoins is increasing and the prices are various, do you know, in your opinion, what altcoins are still cheap now but have good potential for the future? I want to hear an explanation from you?Take a look on those projects that have down 80 to 90% and see their progress if they are still working on their development and update. If it is, then thats likely to recover in the coming bull run. Not all projects can deifnitely go back but only those have real potential and serious to develop their use case om different cases.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: Cronos by Crypto.com might be a good idea. It became cheaper after it fell down so it's a good opportunity to buy. It's a big company so I guess worrying about their reputation will not be a problem at all. Ethereum might be expensive but it will not be gone from my list to be bought whenever I have the spare. BNB too. As its usage will be nonstop in their exchange there is always a chance for growth, and their chain seems to be growing with NFTs using it for cheaper transaction fees. Check the popular cryptocurrency reference website for easier tracking of the good coins but don't expect too much with anything you pick.

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: This is still a mystery because every cheap coin on the exchange has the same potential and depends on developer support and other support. But maybe you can look at the coins under $1 and analyze them one by one to find them but it won't be easy because, from the top 100 list, you will have a list of over 20 cheap coins. And from that list, you won't know which ones have the potential for the future.Maybe you can try to find out more about Shiba coins, ADA, Matic, XRP, STR, Tron, CRO, HBAR, and others. That alone might have taken longer to find the info. But from that list, I already own some of it and now, I'm just in a position to wait for the price to increase.

comments.author: Godday
comments.body: If you look at the current market I don't think we can talk about altcoins that are cheap but worth buying.  For now I prefer to invest in the top 100 coins and tokens on coinmarketcap.  Currently I have deposited about 30 types of altcoins with around $100-$1000 assets but I advise you to choose tokens and coins that you trust.

comments.author: ivankoh
comments.body: Always do your research, even if you get some hints/suggestions. The current trend is the recovery of the status of bitcoin, altcoins will also be in line with demand diversity next reaction. SOV is a coin that is tending to mature faster, more relevant and compatible with market needs. It's still cheap compared to the valuation. So I think it's a good place to look for profit

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: Quote from: Bazzu on January 31, 2023, 01:52:47 AMI want to ask everyone, now the number of altcoins is increasing and the prices are various, do you know, in your opinion, what altcoins are still cheap now but have good potential for the future? I want to hear an explanation from you?Just a heads up this is probably the worst way to find out decent projects that are still undervalued or "cheap".  Ypu are just going to get people shilling theor bags to ypu whether they are good or not.  I advise you to do your own research, not only here but the vast amount of information that's out there.  Too any times people have blindly taken advise from bag skillets and have lost theor money.  Good luck weeding through all the scams hopefully you finsld a worthy project or 2.
